abilities.desc: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
abilities.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

abilities.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
abilities.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

abilities.desc: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
abilities.lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

abilities.desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
abilities.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

AGHS.desc: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.

abilities.desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
abilities.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

abilities.desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as he's facing away from Axe.
abilities.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.

abilities.desc: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
abilities.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

abilities.desc: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
abilities.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

abilities.desc: Lowers the enemy's total attack damage, cast range, and regeneration.
abilities.lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

abilities.desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
abilities.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
abilities.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

abilities.desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely. Enemy Units take Pure Damage Per Second while in Nightmare.
abilities.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.

abilities.desc: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
abilities.lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

abilities.desc: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
abilities.lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.

abilities.desc: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 80%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
abilities.lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

abilities.desc: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.
abilities.lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

AGHS.desc: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, damaging himself to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown.

abilities.desc: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
abilities.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

abilities.desc: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
abilities.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

abilities.desc: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map; this bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden. Whenever Crystal Maiden casts a spell, restores some mana to all friendly units within 1200 radius.
abilities.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
abilities.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

abilities.desc: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.
abilities.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.

abilities.desc: Channeling. Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.
abilities.lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.

abilities.desc: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow. Drow Gains Movement Speed for the same duration.
abilities.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

abilities.desc: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.
abilities.lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.

abilities.desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
abilities.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.

abilities.desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 75 bonus attack range on the next attack.
abilities.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.

abilities.desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
abilities.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.

abilities.desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
abilities.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

abilities.desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
abilities.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

abilities.desc:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.

abilities.desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 325 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
abilities.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.

abilities.desc: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
abilities.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'

AGHS.desc: Performs a short Omnislash for 0.8 seconds.

abilities.desc: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 3.2,3.8,4.4,5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 180 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
abilities.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.

abilities.desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
abilities.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.

abilities.desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 2.5 seconds.
abilities.lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.

abilities.desc: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.
abilities.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.

abilities.desc: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
abilities.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

abilities.desc:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.
abilities.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

abilities.desc:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.
abilities.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

abilities.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
abilities.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

abilities.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
abilities.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

abilities.desc: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
abilities.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
abilities.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
abilities.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
abilities.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.
abilities.lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
abilities.lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.9 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.7. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.  Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
abilities.lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.

abilities.desc: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
abilities.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.

abilities.desc:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500% bonus damage and deals -80% less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.

abilities.desc: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.
abilities.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...

abilities.desc: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
abilities.lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.

abilities.desc: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
abilities.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.

abilities.desc: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
abilities.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
abilities.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.

abilities.desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
abilities.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.

abilities.desc: Gives Pudge a guaranteed damage block against all types of attack. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
abilities.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

abilities.desc: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
abilities.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.

abilities.desc: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
abilities.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.

abilities.desc: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.
abilities.lore: Allies emerge forever changed.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.
abilities.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'

abilities.desc: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
abilities.lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

abilities.desc: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
abilities.lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.

abilities.desc: Passively increases Razor's movement speed.
abilities.lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

abilities.desc: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
abilities.lore: Ride the lightning.

abilities.desc: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
abilities.lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

abilities.desc: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
abilities.lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.

abilities.desc: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.
abilities.lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

abilities.desc: After a cast point of 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
abilities.lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.

abilities.desc: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
abilities.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.

abilities.desc: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
abilities.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.

abilities.desc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
abilities.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!

abilities.desc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 15+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 15+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
abilities.lore: The Storm is coming in.

abilities.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
abilities.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.

abilities.desc: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
abilities.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

abilities.desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 8 seconds.
abilities.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!

abilities.desc: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 35 seconds.
abilities.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.

abilities.desc: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 2x damage to units being tossed.
abilities.lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

abilities.desc: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
abilities.lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.

abilities.desc: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
abilities.lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

AGHS.desc: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
AGHS.lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.

AGHS.desc: Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
AGHS.lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

abilities.desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
abilities.lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.

abilities.desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
abilities.lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.

abilities.desc: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.
abilities.lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

abilities.desc: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take 50 damage Allied swapped units receive less damage for a short duration
abilities.lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.

abilities.desc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75,0.75,0.75,0.75.
abilities.lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.

abilities.desc: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced.
abilities.lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.

abilities.desc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
abilities.lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.

abilities.desc: Windranger channels the wind to gain 300 400 500 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
abilities.lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.

AGHS.desc: Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction. Vector Targeted. Cast Range: 1500 Mana Cost: 150 Cooldown: 30s.
AGHS.lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

abilities.desc: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
abilities.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

abilities.desc: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.
abilities.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.

abilities.desc: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage, reducing their movement, attack speed and increasing their cast time. If Zeus was moving forward, he will jump towards that direction. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
abilities.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

AGHS.desc: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to 9% of their current health.
AGHS.lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.

abilities.desc: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
abilities.lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.

abilities.desc: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
abilities.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

abilities.desc: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
abilities.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.

abilities.desc: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
abilities.lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.

AGHS.desc: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.
Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around Kunkka once every 0.25 for 5 seconds. Spawns within 1100 range of him.
AGHS.lore: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.

abilities.desc: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
abilities.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.

abilities.desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
abilities.lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.

abilities.desc: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18 seconds.
abilities.lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.

abilities.desc: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
abilities.lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.

abilities.desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
abilities.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.

abilities.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
abilities.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
abilities.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.

abilities.desc: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
abilities.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.

abilities.desc: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
abilities.lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.

abilities.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
abilities.lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
abilities.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.

abilities.desc: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
abilities.lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.

abilities.desc: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains movement speed bonus while in the river.
abilities.lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.

abilities.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
abilities.lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.

abilities.desc: After 3 attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps.
abilities.lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.

abilities.desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.
abilities.lore: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.

abilities.desc: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
abilities.lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.

abilities.desc:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.

abilities.desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
abilities.lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.

abilities.desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
abilities.lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.

abilities.desc: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals 200% damage to creeps.
abilities.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.

abilities.desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
abilities.lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.

abilities.desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
abilities.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.
abilities.lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.

AGHS.desc: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

abilities.desc: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage and extra attack speed slow.
abilities.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.
abilities.lore: Mind the cold...

abilities.desc: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
abilities.lore: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.

abilities.desc: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10 10 10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.
abilities.lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.

AGHS.desc: Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Has 800 health.Chain Frost can bounce to the Spire if there are no other enemies in range.Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire.

abilities.desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.
abilities.lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.

abilities.desc: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
abilities.lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.

abilities.desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.
abilities.lore: Riki comes for you.

abilities.desc: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.
abilities.lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.

abilities.desc: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2,2,2,2 seconds.
abilities.lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.

abilities.desc: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
abilities.lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.

abilities.desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their current HP.
abilities.lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
abilities.lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

abilities.desc: Targets an allied unit, applying a barrier to them that blocks some damage and provides Status Resistance.
After channeling for 4.5,4,3.5s teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
abilities.lore: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'

abilities.desc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
abilities.lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

abilities.desc: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within 2500 range.
abilities.lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
abilities.lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.

AGHS.desc: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 3 seconds.

abilities.desc: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 35 seconds.
abilities.lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.

abilities.desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Headshots  briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed slowed by -100%.
abilities.lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.

abilities.desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provide 100% Headshot chance for 3 seconds. Slows you by 45,40,35,30% for the duration.
abilities.lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

abilities.desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.
abilities.lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.

AGHS.desc: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back.  Enemies affected have their movement slowed after the knockback.

abilities.desc: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
abilities.lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.

abilities.desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for 8 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.
abilities.lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.

abilities.desc: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
abilities.lore: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.

abilities.desc: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.
abilities.lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.

AGHS.desc: Spawns a fast moving large Death Pulse towards the target enemy or ally, causing the target to become ethereal. Reduces enemy magic resistance. Spreads towards nearby enemies and allies after impact.

abilities.desc: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
abilities.lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.

abilities.desc: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
abilities.lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 10,12,14,16 seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
abilities.lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.

abilities.desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60,60,60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
abilities.lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.

abilities.desc: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
abilities.lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.

abilities.desc: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.
abilities.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

abilities.desc: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.
abilities.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

abilities.desc: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
abilities.lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.

abilities.desc: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 3 seconds.
abilities.lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.

abilities.desc: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds. Queen of Pain relishes in the pain inflicted, healing every time the enemy takes damage. Creeps heal for half the damage only.
abilities.lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.

abilities.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
abilities.lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.

abilities.desc: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
abilities.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.

abilities.desc: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.
abilities.lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.

abilities.desc: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
abilities.lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.

abilities.desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.
abilities.lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.

abilities.desc: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
abilities.lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.

abilities.desc: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.
abilities.lore: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.

abilities.desc: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.
Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
abilities.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.

abilities.desc: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 8,9,10,11 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 10% for each cooldown extended. Deals damage per second for each cooldown.

Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
abilities.lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.

AGHS.desc: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.
AGHS.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.

abilities.desc: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
abilities.lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

abilities.desc: Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.
abilities.lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.

abilities.desc: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
abilities.lore: One blow to crush a foe.

abilities.desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.
abilities.lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.

abilities.desc: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
abilities.lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.

abilities.desc: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
abilities.lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.

abilities.desc: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.

Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts 35 seconds.
abilities.lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.

abilities.desc: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65+25 40 55 70% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
abilities.lore: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.

abilities.desc: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
abilities.lore: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.

abilities.desc:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
abilities.lore: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.

abilities.desc: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.
abilities.lore: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.

AGHS.desc: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.

abilities.desc: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
abilities.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.

abilities.desc: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage. Can be cast while channeling.
abilities.lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.

abilities.desc: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero. Heroes within its radius deal reduced damage from their spells.
abilities.lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.

abilities.desc:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.
abilities.lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.

abilities.desc: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
abilities.lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.

abilities.desc: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 12 seconds.
abilities.lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.

abilities.desc: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.
abilities.lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.

abilities.desc: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 60% after 4 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
abilities.lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.

abilities.desc: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

AGHS.desc: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 1.5 seconds, detonating it upon arrival. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
AGHS.lore: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.

abilities.desc: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 5 times.
abilities.lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.

abilities.desc: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.
abilities.lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.

abilities.desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
abilities.lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.

abilities.desc: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
abilities.lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.

abilities.desc: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
abilities.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.

abilities.desc: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
abilities.lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.

abilities.desc: Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.
abilities.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

abilities.desc: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10.0 seconds.
abilities.lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.

abilities.desc: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
abilities.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.

abilities.desc: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
abilities.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.

abilities.desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
abilities.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.

abilities.desc:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20,20,20,30 poison damage per second for 5,5,5 seconds. Works on structures.
LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 350 radius for 75,75,75,100% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by -40,-40,-40,-60% and attack speed by -40,-40,-40,-60 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3,3,3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
abilities.lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.

AGHS.desc: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

abilities.desc: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.
abilities.lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.

abilities.desc: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.
abilities.lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.

abilities.desc: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
abilities.lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.

abilities.desc:
Whenever a Unit is affected by Dazzle's spells they temporarily gain/lose armor.
  Can be activated to heal/deal physical damage to units based on the amount of charges they have.
abilities.lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.

abilities.desc: Whenever Dazzle Casts a Spell, all other abilities currently on cooldown have their cooldowns reduced.
abilities.lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.

abilities.desc: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun. Deals double damage to creeps
abilities.lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.

abilities.desc: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
abilities.lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.

abilities.desc: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 6.0 seconds.
abilities.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.

abilities.desc: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
abilities.lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.

AGHS.desc: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.
Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.
AGHS.lore: Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.

abilities.desc: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
abilities.lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.

abilities.desc: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Lasts 10 seconds.
abilities.lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.

abilities.desc: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.
abilities.lore: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.

abilities.desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.
abilities.lore: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.

AGHS.desc: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.

abilities.desc: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, and providing vision in a 250 radius.
abilities.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.

abilities.desc: Teleports to any point on the map.
abilities.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.

abilities.desc: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
abilities.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.

abilities.desc: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Enemies that die under this spell grant you bonus damage for 50 seconds.
abilities.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.

abilities.desc:
Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, and gaining increased movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.

abilities.desc: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health.
abilities.lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.

abilities.desc: Passively causes Lifestealer's attacks to significantly slow enemy movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Grants you Attack Speed.

Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.

AGHS.desc: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes. After receiving 500 damage, the Open Wounds fester and spread to a non-infected random enemy within 700 radius.
AGHS.lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.

abilities.desc: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
abilities.lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.

abilities.desc: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
abilities.lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.

abilities.desc: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of movement speed and removes unit collisions. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.
abilities.lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.

abilities.desc: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.
abilities.lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.

AGHS.desc: Passive cooldown attack. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock an illusion out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3.0 seconds. Max power is reached after 900 distance moved.

abilities.desc: Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers.
abilities.lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.

abilities.desc: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
abilities.lore: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.

abilities.desc: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items.
abilities.lore: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.

abilities.desc: Clinkz consumes the target enemy unit or friendly unit, gaining max health and damage based on its current health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.
abilities.lore: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.

AGHS.desc: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.
AGHS.lore: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.

abilities.desc: Omniknight fires his hammer to a target to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slows the target.
Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
abilities.lore: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.

abilities.desc:
Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them increased Status Resistance, Strength and Health Regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.

abilities.desc: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants allies immunity from physical damage.
abilities.lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.

AGHS.desc: Greatly degenerates the movement capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
AGHS.lore: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.

abilities.desc: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
abilities.lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.

abilities.desc:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing its attack damage and max health. Only one creep can be controlled at a time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.

abilities.desc: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 12 seconds.
abilities.lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.

abilities.desc: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.
abilities.lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.

AGHS.desc: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 3 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 200.
AGHS.lore: Sproink is as Sproink does.

abilities.desc: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.
abilities.lore: Not even Huskar's own flesh can contain the unending expansion of his life force.

abilities.desc: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.
abilities.lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.

abilities.desc: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.
abilities.lore: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.

abilities.desc:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a targe to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.

abilities.desc: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and the slowing effect lasts longer.
abilities.lore: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.

abilities.desc: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.
abilities.lore: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.

abilities.desc: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
abilities.lore: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.

abilities.desc: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.
abilities.lore: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.

abilities.desc: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
abilities.lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.

abilities.desc: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement. Spin Web charges restore every %abilitychargerestoretime% seconds, with a max of %AbilityCharges% charges. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP
abilities.lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of foreboding.

abilities.desc: Slows the target enemy, causes them to miss and deals impact damage. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.
A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
abilities.lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.

AGHS.lore: The slightest tremor of her web is all Arachnia needs to find her prey.

abilities.desc: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.  Deals bonus damage to Tracked targets.
abilities.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.

abilities.desc: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.
abilities.lore: Gondar's vast experience ensures he never walks away from a transaction empty-handed.

abilities.desc: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will slow the target's movement speed.
abilities.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.

abilities.desc: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit and deals critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.
abilities.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.

abilities.desc: Weaver launches a swarm of 12,12,12,12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
abilities.lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.

abilities.desc: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
abilities.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.

abilities.desc: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
abilities.lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.

abilities.desc:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.

abilities.desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
abilities.lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.

abilities.desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
abilities.lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.

abilities.desc: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks. Deals 75% damage to buildings.
abilities.lore: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.

abilities.desc: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
